book.title: The Silent Battle
book.description: 简介： Gallatin wearily lowered the creel from his shoulders and dropped it by his rod at the foot of a tree. He knew that he was losthad known it, in fact, for an hour or more, but with the certainty that there was no way out until morning, perhaps not eve...
